title: Graduate Trainee
description:
Diageo is the world's leading premium drinks business with an outstanding collection of international brands across spirits, wine and beer. These brands include: Smirnoff, Guinness, Johnnie Walker, Captain Morgan, Baileys, J&B, José Cuervo and Tanqueray.

Many of our brands have been around for generations, while some have been developed more recently to meet new consumer tastes and experiences. Our great range of brands and geographic spread means that people can celebrate with our products at every occasion no matter where they are in the world. This is why 'celebrating life every day, everywhere' is at the core of what we do.

Germany and Benelux Sales and Marketing Programme

We are now recruiting the leaders of tomorrow; calling for young talent to join the teams behind our brands! As one of the most admired companies to work for, Diageo values and celebrates success, takes pride in team achievement, while upholding the essence of team spirit.

Diageo’s three-year intensive graduate programmes open up opportunities across 9 Europe Markets for successful applicants. We are currently recruiting talented individuals to join our Sales and Marketing Programme based in Germany and Benelux.  This programme is also pan-European and we therefore offer the opportunity to travel and work in other European markets!  You will have rotations as a Business Development Executive, working directly with our customers, within Customer marketing coming up with strategies to strengthen the category in your customer's environment, and also Consumer Marketing as an Assistant Brand Manager with the opportunity to work on some of our iconic brands such as, Guinness, Smirnoff, Baileys, Johnnie Walker and Gordon’s to name just a few.

The idea is to give you a ‘real job’ in each of your three rotations, effectively preparing you for complex business challenges, while providing ready support through your ‘buddy’ and ‘mentor’. You will be given enormous responsibility in your roles, working alongside experts in your chosen area, to give you the most intensive training, while expecting you to use your creative energies and business acumen to generate ideas, find solutions and bring these to life for us and yourselves. 

We promote a healthy work-life balance for our employees and offer a competitive salary, together with a comprehensive benefits package. 

If you are an enthusiastic and passionate graduate who has aspirations to be a leader of tomorrow we welcome you to apply! 


Person Specification
•	300 UCAS points or equivalent
•	A 2:1 degree or equivalent
•	To be globally mobile
•	A full, valid driving licence for a sales and marketing role
•	Fluent in both English and either Dutch or German
how_to_apply:
Applying is an easy 3-step process:
Step 1
•	After emailing us your CV and successfully completing an application form via our website, you’ll be invited to take some online verbal and numerical tests. If you sail through these, then... 
Step 2
•	The next step is a telephone interview based on the Diageo capabilities lasting about 45 mins. If you shine in your interview, then... 
Step 3
•	The third step is half a day spent at an assessment centre, involving an interview, a role play, a presentation and a group exercise.
Germany and Benelux Sales and Marketing Programme - is NOW OPEN for applications. Applications will close on Friday 11th March 2011. 
Go to www.diageo.com/careers to apply now!!
